front.title: Handling multiple verifiers in RATS architecture

abstract.t: In the IETF Remote Attestation Procedures (RATS) architecture, a Verifier accepts Evidence and generates Attestation Results needed by Relying Parties. This document provides a solution to inconsistent behaviors of the Verifier in the RATS architecture by introducing a mechanism to aggregate Attestation Results collected from multiple Verifiers at the Relying Party while simplifying its policy and operation.
